pkg.name: summary-list
pkg.title: Summary list
pkg.description: Summary list is used to summarise information such as a user’s responses at the end of a form.

scope.title: Summary list

relatedComponents.name: table
relatedComponents.title: Table
relatedComponents.description: Tables help make complex information easier to scan and compare. Use tables for exact values or information that would be hard to read in body text.
